workflow.name: Automate SEO research & content gap analysis with GPT-4o, SerpAPI, and Gmail
workflow.description:
üìò Description
This workflow automates keyword-level SEO research and content opportunity discovery using live Google SERP data and AI-driven analysis. It takes a single keyword request, pulls real-time search results for the India market, converts raw SERP data into a structured SEO dataset, analyzes search intent and competition, identifies content gaps and high-impact opportunities, and delivers client-ready insights via email while logging results for tracking and audits.

Instead of manual keyword research, competitive scanning, and reporting, the system derives actionable SEO strategy directly from live search behavior. Outputs are structured for UI consumption, professional email delivery, and historical storage in Google Sheets. Any workflow failure triggers an automated Slack alert with diagnostic details.

This workflow replaces manual SEO research, gap analysis, reporting, and documentation with a repeatable, automated SEO intelligence pipeline.

## ‚öôÔ∏è What This Workflow Does (Step-by-Step)

üü¢ Receive SEO Keyword Analysis Request via Webhook
 Accepts a POST request containing the target keyword for SEO analysis.

üßπ Extract Keyword from Request Payload
 Cleans and isolates the keyword field for SERP processing.

üåê Run Google SERP Search for Keyword (India)
 Executes a live Google search via SerpAPI with India as the target region.
 Fetches:
 ‚Ä¢ Organic search results
 ‚Ä¢ Related searches
 ‚Ä¢ Video SERP features
 ‚Ä¢ Result count metadata

üß© Normalize SERP Results into SEO Dataset
 Transforms raw SERP output into a structured dataset containing:
 ‚Ä¢ Rankings, titles, snippets, and sources
 ‚Ä¢ Video presence and platforms
 ‚Ä¢ Related search intent signals

üß† Analyze Keyword SEO Opportunities Using AI
 Uses GPT-4o to determine:
 ‚Ä¢ Search intent
 ‚Ä¢ Competition level
 ‚Ä¢ Content gaps
 ‚Ä¢ High-impact content opportunities
 ‚Ä¢ Recommended content formats
 Returns strictly structured JSON output.

üß™ Parse Market Analysis Output JSON
 Validates and enforces the predefined SEO analysis schema.

üîÑ Flatten AI Output for Downstream Use
 Removes nested AI structures to simplify reporting and UI usage.

üß≠ Map SEO Fields for UI & Reporting
 Aligns SEO insights to UI-friendly keys, including confidence scoring and reporting fields.

üìß Generate Client-Ready SEO Insights Email Using AI
 Converts SEO analysis into a professional HTML email containing:
 ‚Ä¢ Keyword & country context
 ‚Ä¢ Search intent explanation
 ‚Ä¢ Competition level
 ‚Ä¢ Content gaps
 ‚Ä¢ Top content opportunities with difficulty
 ‚Ä¢ Recommended formats
 ‚Ä¢ Overall confidence score

üì§ Send SEO Opportunity Report via Email
 Delivers the formatted SEO opportunity report to the configured recipient via Gmail.

üìä Log SEO Analysis Result to Google Sheets
 Stores keyword, intent, competition, confidence, gaps, and opportunities for:
 ‚Ä¢ Tracking
 ‚Ä¢ Audits
 ‚Ä¢ Historical SEO analysis

üö® Error Handler Trigger ‚Üí Slack Alert
 Any workflow failure sends an automated Slack alert with node name, error message, and timestamp.

üß© Prerequisites
 ‚Ä¢ SerpAPI account
 ‚Ä¢ OpenAI API key
 ‚Ä¢ Gmail OAuth credentials
 ‚Ä¢ Google Sheets OAuth access
 ‚Ä¢ Slack API credentials
 ‚Ä¢ Valid webhook endpoint for keyword submission

üí° Key Benefits
 ‚úî Automates keyword-level SEO research using live SERP data
 ‚úî Identifies content gaps and opportunities based on real search behavior
 ‚úî Produces client-ready SEO insight reports automatically
 ‚úî Eliminates manual competitor analysis and documentation
 ‚úî Logs SEO intelligence for long-term tracking and audits
 ‚úî Provides immediate error visibility through Slack alerts

üë• Perfect For
-  SEO agencies delivering keyword opportunity reports
-  Content teams planning data-driven content calendars
-  Founders validating SEO demand before investing in content
-  Marketing teams prioritizing high-impact keywords
-  Operators needing repeatable SEO research workflows

parameters.content:
## üö® Error Handling 

 
Catches any workflow failure and posts an alert to Slack.  
Includes node name, error message, and timestamp for quick debugging.

nodes.name: Run Google SERP Search for Keyword (India)
Normalize SERP Results into SEO Dataset

options.systemMessage:
=You are an SEO strategist working for an SEO agency.

Your job is to analyze Google search results and identify:
- Search intent
- Competition level
- Content gaps
- High-impact content opportunities

Focus on gaps and opportunities, not summaries.
Be practical and concise.

nodes.name: Flatten AI Output for Downstream Use
Map SEO Fields for UI & Reporting

parameters.text:
=Create a professional SEO Content Opportunity email summary using the following data.

Include these sections:
1. Keyword & Country
2. Search Intent (short paragraph)
3. Competition Level (clear and direct)
4. Key Content Gaps (bullet list)
5. Top Content Opportunities (title + short description + difficulty)
6. Recommended Content Formats
7. Overall Confidence Score

Format the output as clean HTML with headings, bullet points, and spacing suitable for email.

SEO Analysis Data:
{{ JSON.stringify($json, null, 2) }}

options.systemMessage:
=You are a senior SEO consultant writing professional client-ready email reports.

Your task:
- Summarize the provided SEO analysis clearly and concisely
- Use a clean, visually structured HTML format
- Keep the tone professional, clear, and business-friendly
- Do NOT include raw JSON
- Do NOT mention AI, prompts, or internal processes

The output must be valid HTML suitable for email.

nodes.name: Send SEO Opportunity Report via Email
Log SEO Analysis Result to Google Sheets

parameters.content:
## üîç SEO Keyword & Content Gap Analysis Workflow (Loveable UI)
This workflow automates keyword-level SEO research and content opportunity
analysis using live Google SERP data and AI-driven insights.

The workflow starts by receiving a keyword via webhook ‚Üí performs a
Google SERP search focused on India ‚Üí normalizes raw SERP results into a
clean SEO dataset ‚Üí uses GPT-4o to analyze search intent, competition level,
content gaps, and high-impact content opportunities.

The analyzed output is then reshaped for UI consumption, logged into
Google Sheets for tracking and audits, converted into a client-ready
HTML email report, and delivered via Gmail.

This system eliminates manual SEO research, ensures consistent analysis,
and produces actionable, presentation-ready insights for marketers,
content teams, and clients.

## üì• SEO Keyword Intake
Receives and prepares the keyword for analysis.

‚Ä¢ Receive SEO Keyword Analysis Request  
  Accepts a POST webhook containing the target keyword.

‚Ä¢ Extract Keyword from Request Payload  
  Cleans and isolates the keyword field for SERP analysis.

## üåê Google SERP Data Collection (India)
Fetches real-time search engine results.

‚Ä¢ Run Google SERP Search for Keyword (India)  
  Executes a Google search via SerpAPI, returning organic results,
  related searches, and video signals.

## üßπ SERP Normalization & SEO Dataset Creation
Transforms raw SERP data into an analysis-ready format.

‚Ä¢ Normalize SERP Results into SEO Dataset  
  Extracts organic rankings, snippets, sources, videos, and
  related searches into a structured SEO dataset.

## üß† AI SEO Opportunity & Gap Analysis
Analyzes keyword competitiveness and content gaps.

‚Ä¢ Analyze Keyword SEO Opportunities (AI)  
  Uses GPT-4o to determine:
  - Search intent
  - Competition level
  - Content gaps
  - High-impact content opportunities
  - Recommended content formats

‚Ä¢ Parse Market Analysis Output JSON  
  Validates and enforces structured AI output schema.

## üîÑ Output Preparation for UI & Reporting
Prepares AI results for downstream systems.

‚Ä¢ Flatten AI Output for Downstream Use  
  Removes nested structures from AI output.

‚Ä¢ Map SEO Fields for UI & Reporting  
  Aligns SEO fields to UI-friendly keys and reporting requirements,
  including confidence scoring.

## üìß Client-Ready SEO Insight Report
Creates professional, presentation-ready summaries.

‚Ä¢ Generate Client-Ready SEO Insights Email (AI)  
  Converts SEO insights into a clean HTML email with:
  - Search intent
  - Competition
  - Content gaps
  - Opportunities
  - Recommended formats

‚Ä¢ LLM Engine for Insight Formatting  
  Provides GPT-4o for professional email-quality output.

## üì§ Distribution & Audit Logging
Delivers and stores SEO insights.

‚Ä¢ Send SEO Opportunity Report via Email  
  Sends the final SEO opportunity report to the configured recipient.

‚Ä¢ Log SEO Analysis Result to Google Sheets  
  Stores keyword, intent, competition, confidence, and opportunities
  for tracking, audits, and historical analysis.

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details: In n8n, when a workflow execution fails, it can start another workflow. This second workflow can be any arbitrary workflow on your n8n instance. Use the Error Trigger node as your Trigger in the Error workflow.
